lead_paragraph: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China paid a token $1 for a small American brokerage firm, The Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.
snippet: Industrial & Commercial Bank of China, the world's biggest lender by market value, paid a token $1 for a small U.S. brokerage firm, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: I.C.B.C. Buys BNP Paribas Brokerage Unit

abstract: Industrial & Commercial Bank of China, the world's biggest lender by market value, paid a token $1 for a small U.S. brokerage firm, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.
